feed.title: Tyler Craig
feed.subtitle: Tyler Craig is a Technical Product Specalist at Dynatrace. He recieved his Bachelor's degree from Colorado State University in Computer Science with an emphasis in Cyber Security and Networking.

entry.title: A Trial Draft Post
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

This is my first post on this site. Ideally, I am going to add more content about the projects I am working on here, but for now this is pretty empty.

Hope you have a great day!
